machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
; Beginning of Right Extruder End G-code
M211 S0       ; Disable software endstops
G91           ; Relative positioning
M83           ; Relative extrusion
G60           ; Save current position
G0 F1000 Z1   ; Raise nozzle
G1 F3600 E-6  ; Short retract
G0 F6000 X315 ; Move to purge bucket
G1 F1500 E-94 ; Unload filament

T0            ; Enable left extruder
G1 F3600 E100 ; Load filament
G1 F180 E50   ; Purge
G1 F3600 E-6  ; Short retract
M106          ; Fan on
G4 S5         ; Wait
M107          ; Fan off
G0 F6000 X300 ; Wipe
G0 X315       ; Wipe
G0 X300       ; Wipe
G0 X315       ; Wipe
G61 F6000     ; Return to saved position
M211 S1       ; Enable software endstops
; End of Right Extruder End G-code
